item.title: Interface help (easy)
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

Yes works, i just have this new problem showing up

setInterfaceWalkable(15892); sendQuest("Barrows", 15894); if(Guthan == 0) { sendQuest("Guthan: Live", 15895); } else { sendQuest("Guthan: Dead", 15895); if(Ahrim == 0) { sendQuest("Ahrim: Live", 15897); } else { sendQuest("Ahrim: Death", 15897); if(Verac == 0) { sendQuest("Verac: Live", 15898); } else { sendQuest("Verac: Death", 15898); if(Dharok == 0) { sendQuest("Dharok: Live", 15899); } else { sendQuest("Dharok: Death", 15899); if(Torag == 0) { sendQuest("Torag: Live", 15900); } else { sendQuest("Torag: Death", 15900); if(Karils == 0) { sendQuest("Karils: Live", 15901); } else { sendQuest("Karils: Death", 15901); sendQuest("", 15896); sendQuest("", 15902); sendQuest("", 15903); sendQuest("", 15904); sendQuest("", 15905); sendQuest("", 15906); } } } } } }

item.title: Interface help (easy)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

do:

setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
sendQuest("Barrows", 15894);
if(Ahrim == 0) {
sendQuest("Ahrim: ALIVE", 15895);
} else {
sendQuest("Ahrim: DEAD", 15895);
}if(Verac == 0) {
sendQuest("Verac: ALIVE", 15896);
} else {
sendQuest("Verac: DEAD", 15896);
}if(Guthan == 0) {
sendQuest("Guthan: ALIVE", 15897);
} else {
sendQuest("Guthan: DEAD", 15897);
}if(Torag == 0) {
sendQuest("Torag: ALIVE", 15898);
} else {
sendQuest("Torag: DEAD", 15898);
}if(Dharok == 0) {
sendQuest("Dharok: ALIVE", 15899);
} else {
sendQuest("Dharok: DEAD", 15899);
}
        sendQuest("", 15896);
        sendQuest("", 15902);
        sendQuest("", 15903);
        sendQuest("", 15904);
        sendQuest("", 15905);
        sendQuest("", 15906);

here, try this!

Read full topic

item.title: Interface help (easy)

item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

hello, im making barrows and i need some help here.

1 = killed 0 live but i wants its to be live if for example Guthan = 0; i wants it to stay like Guthan LIVE and if Guthan = 1; Guthan KILLED

setInterfaceWalkable(15892); sendQuest("Barrows", 15894); sendQuest("Guthan: "+Guthan+"", 15895); sendQuest("Ahrim: "+Ahrim+"", 15897); sendQuest("Verac: "+Verac+"", 15898); sendQuest("Dharok: "+Dharok+"", 15899); sendQuest("Torag: "+Torag+"", 15900); sendQuest("Karils: "+Karils+"", 15901); sendQuest("", 15896); sendQuest("", 15902); sendQuest("", 15903); sendQuest("", 15904); sendQuest("", 15905); sendQuest("", 15906);

i hope you can help me!

Mathias
